```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Loading the data
```{r,echo=FALSE}
df<- read_csv("_raw/COVID19_open_line_list.csv")
df

```

## Including Plots
```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
sym<-df %>%
  select(symptoms) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  str_split(.," , ")

```

# Extracting symptoms
```{r}

s<-as.tibble(df$symptoms)

colnames(s)<-as.character("symptom")


# 
s2<-s %>%
  transform(symptom = str_split(symptom, ",|;")) %>%
  unnest() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  as.data.frame(str_replace(s2$symptom,"^ ", "")) %>%
  distinct_all()


nys<-as.data.frame(str_replace(s2$symptom,"^ ", ""))

colnames(nys)<-as.character("s")


nys %>%
  distinct(s)


```
